name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **ReactJS**, **Node.js**, and **AWS**, with hands-on expertise in backend development using **NestJS** and building **RESTful APIs**. Experienced in frontend technologies such as **AG Grid** and **Apache Echarts**. 
Skilled in deploying scalable systems on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud**, and implementing robust **CI/CD** pipelines within Agile environments. Demonstrated ability to solve complex problems with effective communication skills. Strong knowledge of **PostgreSQL** and version control using **Git**. Adept at building AI/ML-powered platforms and familiar with microservices and event-driven architectures.
